docs.snippet: The owner of Biloxi's Margaritaville casino has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection Tuesday, only hours before a hearing where the landlord aimed to seize the property....

headline.print_headline: 3 Survive Capsizing, Make Night Swim to Safety
headline.main: 3 Survive Capsizing, Make Night Swim to Safety

headline.sub: Dow touches record ahead of Fed vote
headline.main: Dow touches record ahead of Fed vote

headline.main: Miley Cyrus Date Barely Makes Court Appearance

headline.print_headline: UN Leader Begins Term During Period of 'Tumult'
headline.main: UN Leader Begins Term During Period of 'Tumult'

docs.snippet: Sam Kutesa began his first day as president of the U.N. General Assembly Tuesday by describing the current year as "tumultuous" and the year ahead as "momentous" for the United Nations as it marks its 70th anniversary....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sam Kutesa began his first day as president of the U.N. General Assembly Tuesday by describing the current year as "tumultuous" and the year ahead as "momentous" for the United Nations as it marks its 70th anniversary.
